Pilot Dataset Preprocessing for Power Analysis

reference_data_preprocessing.Rd

Further process sequencing data to extract gene-level expression and library statistics required by the PerturbPlan simulation framework. Outputs are compatible with built-in pilot examples.

Usage

reference_data_preprocessing(
  response_matrix = NULL,
  read_umi_table,
  mapping_efficiency = NULL,
  n_threads = NULL,
  TPM_thres = 0.1,
  downsample_ratio = 0.7,
  D2_rough = 0.3,
  h5_only = FALSE,
  TAP = FALSE,
  primer_threshold = 0.2,
  TAP_target_list = NULL,
  TAP_origin_reference = NULL
)

Arguments

response_matrix

Matrix or NULL. Gene-by-cell matrix of normalized expression responses, typically from reference_data_preprocessing_10x. If h5_only = TRUE, this can be NULL.

read_umi_table

Data frame. QC information from molecule_info.h5 or filtered_feature_bc_matrix.h5, as obtained via obtain_qc_read_umi_table.

mapping_efficiency

Numeric. Estimated mapping efficiency from obtain_mapping_efficiency.

n_threads

Integer. Number of threads used for parallel processing. Default: NULL (single-threaded).

TPM_thres

Numeric. Threshold for filtering low-expression genes during preprocessing.

downsample_ratio

Numeric. Proportion of downsampling used for library size estimation. Default: 0.7.

D2_rough

Numeric. Rough prior value for library variation parameter. Default: 0.3.

h5_only

Logical. If TRUE, skips baseline expression estimation step (only processes read_umi_table). Default: FALSE.

TAP

Logical. If TRUE, applies Targeted Analysis Pipeline (TAP).

primer_threshold

Numeric. Threshold for primer efficiency banding in TAP. Default: 0.2.

TAP_target_list

Character vector. List of target genes for TAP filtering. If NULL, no filtering is applied.

TAP_origin_reference

List. Reference data containing baseline expression statistics for TAP.

Value

A list containing:

baseline_expression_stats

Data frame with gene-level expression statistics including response_id, relative_expression, and expression_size columns.

library_parameters

List with:

  • UMI_per_cell: Estimated UMI/cell count.

  • variation: Estimated variation parameter for PCR bias.

mapping_efficiency

Numeric value representing mapping efficiency.

Details

This function executes the core steps in the pilot data setup for PerturbPlan:

  1. Computes gene expression means and variances from response matrix.

  2. Extracts library-level statistics from HDF5 molecule info.

  3. Outputs a simplified list structure for power analysis.

See also

obtain_expression_information, obtain_qc_read_umi_table, library_estimation

Examples

# First get raw data using reference_data_preprocessing_10x
extdata_path <- system.file("extdata", package = "perturbplan")
# Get raw data from 10x output
raw_data <- reference_data_preprocessing_10x(
  path_to_top_level_output = extdata_path,
  path_to_run_level_output = "cellranger_tiny",
  h5_rough = TRUE
)
# Process into final pilot data format
pilot_data <- reference_data_preprocessing(
  response_matrix = raw_data$response_matrix,
  read_umi_table = raw_data$read_umi_table,
  mapping_efficiency = raw_data$mapping_efficiency,
  TPM_thres = 0.1,
  h5_only = FALSE
)
